LessonCard.structure: Card root -> Header (Title + Favorite) -> Body (Meta + Description) -> Footer (Tags + Actions)

elements.title: text-xl font-serif font-bold text-stone-900 dark:text-stone-100 mb-2 leading-tight
elements.passage: text-sm font-sans font-medium text-amber-700 dark:text-amber-500 mb-3 flex items-center gap-1
elements.description: text-sm text-stone-500 dark:text-stone-400 line-clamp-2 leading-relaxed mb-4

tags.style: px-2.5 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-stone-100 text-stone-600 dark:bg-stone-700 dark:text-stone-300

footer.container: flex items-center justify-between pt-4 border-t border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-700

PageHeader.title: font-serif text-4xl font-bold text-stone-900 dark:text-stone-50 mb-2
PageHeader.subtitle: font-sans text-stone-500 dark:text-stone-400 text-lg

instructions_to_main_agent: UPDATE /app/frontend/src/index.css to import 'Crimson Text' and 'Manrope' correctly if not already consistent.
SET global body background to #F9F7F1 in index.css (or tailwind config).
REFACTOR /app/frontend/src/routes/lessons.tsx to use the new card design.
REMOVE the 'bg-gradient-to-r' div from the card.
USE 'lucide-react' icons with stroke-width={1.5} for a more elegant look.
ENSURE the card uses 'Crimson Text' for the title and 'Manrope' for the rest.
IMPLEMENT the 'Sunday Morning' aesthetic: warm, clean, organic.
For the 'List View', apply similar principles: no vertical gradient bars, use clean typography and spacing.

universal_guidelines.interactivity: All clickable elements must have hover states (color shift or lift).
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast meets WCAG AA (use darker stones/greys for text on off-white).
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to the LessonCard container and interactive buttons.
